annotation.spannedText: It's good to know you cannot become infected by getting the hepatitis A vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: It's good to know you cannot become infected by getting the hepatitis A vaccine

annotation.spannedText: in very rare cases, people can have a severe allergic reaction to the hepatitis A vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: in very rare cases, people can have a severe allergic reaction to the hepatitis A vaccine

annotation.spannedText: In extremely rare cases, this reaction can be fatal

classMention.mentionClass: In extremely rare cases, this reaction can be fatal

annotation.spannedText: It's important to remember that the risks from the disease are much greater than the risk from the vaccine itself.

classMention.mentionClass: It's important to remember that the risks from the disease are much greater than the risk from the vaccine itself.
